mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FMS_FILE_METADATA(SOURCE_NAME, DEST_NAME, SUFFIX, SIZE) VALUES (#{sourceName}, #{destName}, #{suffix}, #{fileSize})
INSERT INTO FMS_FILE_METADATA(SOURCE_NAME, DEST_NAME, SUFFIX, SIZE,SWF_FILE_NAME) VALUES (#{sourceName}, #{destName}, #{suffix}, #{fileSize},#{swfName})
INSERT INTO FMS_BIG_FILE_METADATA(SOURCE,SOURCE_NAME, SUFFIX, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{source},#{sourceName},#{suffix}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT SOURCE FROM FMS_BIG_FILE_METADATA WHERE SOURCE_NAME LIKE "%"#{sourceName}"%"
